name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is capable of healing wounds and curing ailments.
looks: The staff has a long wooden handle with intricate engravings of healing symbols. The top of the staff is adorned with a glowing crystal that emits a soft, healing light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Allows the wielder to cast healing spells with increased effectiveness.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that grants healing powers to its wielder.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate carvings of leaves and flowers. It emanates a soft green glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Rusty Dagger
description: An old and worn-out dagger that has seen better days.
looks: The dagger has a tarnished and rusty blade, with a cracked and worn handle.

name: Titanium Helm
description: A sturdy and protective helmet made from titanium.
looks: The titanium helm is a large and imposing helmet with a full-face visor. It has a polished silver finish that gleams in the light.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Arcane Robes
description: Robes infused with arcane magic, providing increased spell power and mana regeneration.
looks: The robes are made of shimmering blue silk, adorned with intricate runes representing different elements of magic.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power and effectiveness of spells.

name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that can heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The wand is made of polished silver and topped with a crystal orb that glows with a soothing blue light.

special_effects.healing_pulse: Emits a healing pulse that restores nearby allies' hit points.

name: Short Sword
description: A small and lightweight sword, perfect for quick strikes and close combat.
looks: The short sword has a short and narrow blade with a simple hilt made of leather. It is designed for agility and precision in battle.

name: Cloak of Shadows
description: A mystical cloak that grants the wearer the ability to blend into the shadows.
looks: The cloak is made of fine black fabric that seems to absorb light. It has a hood that can be pulled up to cover the wearer's face.

special_effects.invisibility: Allows the wearer to become partially invisible in dark areas, making it harder for enemies to detect them.

name: Mage's Robes
description: A set of enchanted robes adorned with mystical symbols.
looks: The robes are made of fine silk and are adorned with intricate embroideries depicting arcane symbols. They shimmer with a soft glow.
